name: crawler
description: server that Crawls the web in search of Swimming Meetings manifests and download the published results

scripts.debug: NODE_INSPECT_RESUME_ON_START=1 NODE_ENV=development CRAWLER_HOST=localhost CRAWLER_PORT=7000 CRAWLER_PATH='/cable' node --inspect crawler/server/index.js

author: 'Steve A.' <steve.alloro@gmail.com>
